original_text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.
korean_text: 또 어떤 사람이 타국에 갈 때 그 종들을 불러 자기 소유를 맡김과 같으니

sentences.original_text: For the kingdom of heaven is
as a man travelling into a far country
and delivered unto them his goods
